properties.areaDesc: Point Isabelle to Lower Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Portage Lake to Huron Island MI to Lower Entrance of Portage Canal To Huron Islands MI Including Keweenaw and Huron Bays
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 10:37PM EST until January 9 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
waves 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Point Isabelle to Lower Entrance of Portage Canal MI
and Lower Entrance of Portage Canal To Huron Islands MI
Including Keweenaw and Huron Bays.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
